name: WIP Incoming Lite
author: Theme in Progress

sections.description:
WIP Incoming Lite is a free Coming Soon, Under Construction & Maintenance Mode WordPress plugin and allows you to manage a launch / under construction page for your WordPress website

Premium features.

User roles
You can disable the public frontpage for each user role.

Background slideshow
You can create a beautiful body background slideshow and make your admin page unique.

Sample data
You can import the preview settings, from the backup section.

Upgrade to the premium version for free
https://www.themeinprogress.com/reserved-area/

Installation

Once you have installed the plugin, you just need to activate the plugin in order to enable it.

Configuration

WIP Incoming Lite will add a new admin page, where you can customize the login page.

Translators

Available Languages

  • English (Default)
  • Italiano
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/wip-incoming-lite’ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Go to ‘WIP Incoming’ page to configure the plugin.
sections.changelog:
1.1.1

  • Fixed: Warning messages “Deprecated: Creation of dynamic property” on PHP 8
  • Tested with PHP 8.3
  • Tested with WordPress 6.4

1.1.0

  • Tested with WordPress 6.2

1.0.9

  • Tested with WordPress 5.7

1.0.8

  • Fixed – Issue between javascript files and the latest jQuery version included with WordPress 5.5
  • Tested with WordPress 5.5

1.0.7

  • Added: WordPress native editor to manage the content of coming soon page
  • Fixed: Compatibility with WordPress 5.2.4

1.0.6

  • Fixed: Compatibility with WordPress 4.9

1.0.5

  • Edit : Code optimized.

1.0.4

  • Fixed: Compatibility with WordPress 4.8
  • Edit : Code optimized.

1.0.3

  • Fixed: Compatibility with WordPress 4.7
  • Optimized : Option panel admin page.
  • Updated : Google Fonts list.
  • Edit : Code optimized.

1.0.2

  • Initial release
